BUGSNAG_API_KEY.description: API key for Bugsnag error reporting. Error reporting will not be enabled if API key is not present.

GITHUB_OAUTH_TOKEN.description: OAuth token for GitHub API access. Generate a token at https://github.com/settings/tokens.

GITHUB_APP_ID.description: App ID for GitHub OAuth login. Generate an app at https://github.com/settings/developers.

GITHUB_APP_SECRET.description: App secret for GitHub OAuth login. Generate an app at https://github.com/settings/developers.

GITHUB_REPO.description: The GitHub repository that this app is monitoring. In the format '{username}/{repository}'

SITE_URL.description: The URL for this app. Unless you're setting up a CNAME, it'll be based on the app name you entered above.

PROJECT_URL.description: The URL for the project website that this app manages.

PROJECT_NAME.description: The name of the project that this app manages. This will be shown in the top left of the site and link to the PROJECT_URL.

PROJECT_LOGO.description: The logo for the project that this app manages. This will be shown in the top left of the site at a height of 20px.

FAVICON_URL.description: The URL for a shortcut icon to show in tab titles and bookmark lists.

EMAIL_DOMAIN.description: Which domain should emails look like they come from?

BLOCK_WEIGHT.description: The weighting for blocks. Normally a large negative value to make rejection of changes easier than adoption.

YES_WEIGHT.description: The weighting for yes votes. Unlikely to be anything other than 1.

NO_WEIGHT.description: The weighting for no votes. Unlikely to be anything other than -1.

MIN_AGE.description: How many days a proposal must be open for in order to be accepted.

MAX_AGE.description: The longest (in days) a proposal can be open for in order to be accepted.

PASS_THRESHOLD.description: How many weighted votes are required to pass?

BLOCK_THRESHOLD.description: Proposals with votes below this threshold will be considered 'blocked' when calculating status.

SMTP_SERVER.description: The name of your SMTP server, for sending mail

SMTP_USERNAME.description: The login username for your SMTP server, for sending mail

SMTP_PASSWORD.description: The password for your SMTP server, for sending mail

BOOTSTRAP_CSS_URL.description: A URL for a Bootstrap 3 CSS file. If not specified, the default theme will be used
